_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: 30 Slot Path of Tians Egg
author: servers@gameservershub.com
description:
Path Of Titans Egg by GameServersHub
GameServersHub.com
startup: awk -v slots="{{SLOTS}}" '/\[\/Script\/PathOfTitans\.IGameSession\]/{print; flag=1; next} flag && /MaxPlayers/{print "MaxPlayers=" slots; flag=0; next} flag && /^$/{print "MaxPlayers=" slots; print; flag=0; next} {print}' ./PathOfTitans/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/Game.ini > ./PathOfTitans/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/temp.ini && mv ./PathOfTitans/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/temp.ini ./PathOfTitans/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/Game.ini &&./PathOfTitans/Binaries/Linux/PathOfTitansServer-Linux-Shipping -MaxPlayers=${SLOTS} -ServerName="${SERVER_NAME}" -Port=$SERVER_PORT -BranchKey=$BETA_BRANCH $(if [ -n "$SERVER_PASSWORD" ]; then echo "-ServerPassword=\"${SERVER_PASSWORD}\""; fi) -AuthToken=$AG_AUTH_TOKEN -ServerGUID=$SERVER_GUID -Database=$DATABASE -nullRHI -log

installation.script:
#! /bin/bash
#
clear
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m'
echo -e "${BLUE}######################################################################################${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}#                                                                                     ${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}# ${YELLOW}Starting Installation...                                                   ${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}#                                                                                     ${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}# ${RED}(c) Copyright 2022 - GameServersHub.com                                       ${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}#                                                                                     ${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}# ${YELLOW}Path Of Titans Install Script                                              ${NC}"                                  
echo -e "${BLUE}# ${YELLOW}Egg by GameServersHub - that411guy                                         ${NC}"                                  
echo -e "${BLUE}#                                                                                     ${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}######################################################################################${NC}"
sleep 3
export HOME=/mnt/server
cd $HOME
echo "Installing Utilities"
apt update
apt install -y wget curl tar
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Downloading AlderonGamesCmd and Installing. Please wait...${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"

wget -O AlderonGamesCmd https://launcher-cdn.alderongames.com/AlderonGamesCmd-Linux-x64
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Download complete. Marking as executable. Please wait...${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"

chmod +x AlderonGamesCmd
export DOTNET_SYSTEM_GLOBALIZATION_INVARIANT=1
./AlderonGamesCmd --game path-of-titans --server true --auth-token $AG_AUTH_TOKEN --beta-branch $BETA_BRANCH --install-dir .
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Creating folders. Please wait...${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"

mkdir -p $HOME/PathOfTitans
mkdir -p $HOME/PathOfTitans/Saved
mkdir -p $HOME/PathOfTitans/Saved/Config
mkdir -p $HOME/PathOfTitans/Saved/Config/LinuxServer
mkdir -p $HOME/Engine
mkdir -p $HOME/Engine/Binaries
mkdir -p $HOME/Engine/Binaries/Linux
mkdir -p $HOME/Engine/Binaries/Linux/CrashReportClient
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"
echo -e "${YELLOW}Downloading startup script and default config files. Please wait...${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}-------------------------------------------------${NC}"

wget -O $HOME/PathOfTitans/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/Game.ini https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GameServersHub-LLC/Ptero-Eggs/main/game_eggs/own_games/path_of_titans_gsh_egg/Game.ini >/dev/null 2>&1
wget -O $HOME/.pteroignore https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GameServersHub-LLC/Ptero-Eggs/main/game_eggs/own_games/path_of_titans_gsh_egg/.pteroignore >/dev/null 2>&1
wget -O $HOME/PathOfTitans/Saved/MOTD.txt https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GameServersHub-LLC/Ptero-Eggs/main/game_eggs/own_games/path_of_titans_gsh_egg/MOTD.txt >/dev/null 2>&1
wget -O $HOME/PathOfTitans/Saved/Rules.txt https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GameServersHub-LLC/Ptero-Eggs/main/game_eggs/own_games/path_of_titans_gsh_egg/Rules.txt >/dev/null 2>&1
wget -O $HOME/PathOfTitans/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/Commands.ini https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GameServersHub-LLC/Ptero-Eggs/main/game_eggs/own_games/path_of_titans_gsh_egg/Commands.ini >/dev/null 2>&1
wget -O $HOME/PathOfTitans/Saved/Config/LinuxServer/GameUserSettings.ini https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GameServersHub-LLC/Ptero-Eggs/main/game_eggs/own_games/path_of_titans_gsh_egg/GameUserSettings.ini >/dev/null 2>&1
chmod +x $HOME/PathOfTitans/Binaries/Linux/PathOfTitansServer-Linux-Shipping
## install end
echo -e "${BLUE}######################################################################################${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}#                                                                                     ${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}# ${YELLOW}Installation completed...${BLUE}                                           ${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}#                                                                                     ${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}# ${RED}(c) Copyright 2022 - GameServersHub.com${BLUE}                                ${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}#                                                                                     ${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}# ${YELLOW}Path Of Titans Install Script${BLUE}                                       ${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}# ${YELLOW}Egg by GameServersHub - 411guy${BLUE}                                      ${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}#                                                                                     ${NC}"
echo -e "${BLUE}######################################################################################${NC}"
sleep 5

variables.name: Server Name
variables.description: Sets the name for the server

variables.name: Server Password
variables.description: You can leave this blank to remove the need for a server password!

variables.name: Discord Link
variables.description: Add your Discord link for players to connect to your Discord server! ****Only add the end of the link example: (https://discord.gg/gsh) Only add the gsh part!

variables.name: Player Slots
variables.description: Max player slots on the server

variables.name: RCON Port
variables.description: This here is your RCON Port For your bots to use!!!

variables.name: Auth Token
variables.description: The AlderonGames Auth Token: Go to https://alderongames.com/oauth/hosting-token to generate one

variables.name: Beta Branch
variables.description: The branch to use for this instance use "production" or "public-test"

variables.name: Database
variables.description: Choose for players save files to be "Local" or "Remote"
